metadata.Title: CVE-2020-5211 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: In NetHack before 3.6.5, an invalid extended command in value for theAUTOCOMPLETE configuration file option can cause a buffer overflowresulting in a crash or remote code execution/privilege escalation. Thisvulnerability affects systems that have NetHack installed suid/sgid andshared systems that allow users to upload their own configuration files.Users should upgrade to NetHack 3.6.5.

criterions.comment: nethack: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
